title: Special provisions shall be made in respect of certain buildings as given below
clause_text: Special provisions shall be made in respect of certain buildings as given below. However, this provision shall stand superseded if new directions are issued by the Government.
section: Prohibition of advertising signs and outdoor display structure in certain cases

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
source_pdf.text_snippet: Special provisions shall be made in respect of certain buildings as given below. However, this provision shall stand superseded if new directions are issued by the Government.
